rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure what languages you'd like the theory test to be available in. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You'll need to use a full name if you do start a new petition.
